<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=279)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 368 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deity**
[Zyphus](/Deities.aspx?ID=160)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 unattended object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

A high-frequency sonic attack shatters a nearby object. You deal 2d10 sonic damage to the object, ignoring the object's Hardness if it is 4 or lower.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d10, and the Hardness the spell ignores increases by 2.
name: Shatter
